name: Moon Pool
description:
This game has set courses that progress in difficulty, groovy music, and a competition mode where you can compete with other Steam users for the high score! Your goal is to dodge as many obstacles as you can, for as long as you can, while falling down a water well that goes to the center of the Earth. See how far you can go, or just twirl around with control for your own amusement, it's up to you how you want to play.
I hope you have a good time playing!
